nodes.text: The Rise of Skywalker (French: L'ascension de Skywalker) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The Rise of Skywalker was written by Ella Patrick and published by Hachette Jeunesse on June 17, 2020.

Emperor Palpatine is alive, ready to take back power over the galaxy. To fight him, the Resistance places all their hopes in Rey. Only she can call upon the ancient Jedi to definitively defeat the dark side of the Force…
